channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy says whether you’re ‘ravenous’ about one thing will determine if your career is a success or stagnates
item.description: In Amazon’s CEO Andy Jassy’s experience, those who seek to improve themselves continuously are the ones who see their careers fly.

item.title: Mortgage refinance demand jumps to a 2-year high, as mortgage rates drop
item.description: Mortgage rates dropped to the lowest level since March last week, sparking swift demand in refinancing.

item.title: U.K. inflation holds steady, keeping interest rate cut in play
Malaysian cyberbully who threatened a TikTok user who then committed suicide only had to pay a $21 fine as punishment
item.description: The death of a Malaysian TikTok user has prompted the government to look into criminalizing cyberbullying and increasing accountability among internet service providers.

item.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens
item.description: Here are the most important news items that investors need to start their trading day.

item.title: ASML shares under pressure as U.S. reportedly considers new export controls
After water pistols in Barcelona and hunger strikes in Spain, cruise ships may avoid European hotspots where ‘passengers will not be well-treated’
item.description: The world's biggest cruise trade body says it may move to protect passengers' safety amid a wave of overtourism protests.

item.title: Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly shares slide on new obesity drug trial from Roche
item.description: Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly shares slid Wednesday on promising early-stage trial data from Roche's latest obesity drug candidate.

item.title: Nearly 50 million people play pickleball. Will they also try this videogame?
The Mirage is disappearing from the Las Vegas strip—but new operators Hard Rock will reinvent it as a massive guitar-shaped hotel
item.description: New operators Hard Rock International plan to add 600 rooms to an existing 3,044 in a bright new guitar-shaped hotel.

item.title: Global chip stocks from Nvidia to ASML fall on geopolitics, Trump comments
item.description: Global chip stocks fell sharply with ASML, Nvidia and TSMC hit amid reports of tighter export restrictions from the U.S. and comments from Donald Trump.

item.title: Here’s how bonds work — and why rate cuts could make them even more attractive
Ex-CIA analyst specializing in North Korea accused of working as South Korean agent in exchange for Bottega Veneta and Louis Vuitton handbags
item.description: Sue Mi Terry, now a senior fellow at the Council on Foreign Relations, was indicted on charges of operating as a foreign agent for more than a decade.

item.title: Wednesday's analyst calls: Rivian price target increase, UnitedHealth upgrade
item.description: An electric vehicle maker and a health insurance giant were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Wednesday.

item.title: Tariffs as leverage? Trump’s allies at GOP convention discuss his economic plans
